articles.description: A growing chorus of university graduates is calling for an overhaul of the HECS-HELP debt system, as loan amounts balloon due to high inflation.
articles.content:
Brisbane wealth adviser Alanna Fraser has been battling to pay off a university student debt of $102,000.
